topicTitle: Admin with access to forum CP

posts.postText:
Please lock donations forum ASAP.
More info to come.
No more donators for the time being.
Take my word for it, this is very important.

I don't know what's happening with my Paypal right now...
Chuck donated THREE times from THREE different accounts.
All three payments are on hold. :/
I'm gonna refund the last 2, but not the newest one and hopefully the first will go through.
I don't know why they're on hold.
When the first goes through I'll add Chuck and unlock it.
If none of them go through, I'll unlock it and not add Chuck.
This should be fixed today.
Sorry.....

*cough*Stupid Paypal*cough*
